long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TJC Bible and Hymn Offline

To facilitate services by providing easy access to Chinese and English versions of holy bible. And hymn book.
~Search book by letter
~Bible and Hymn in Chinese and English
~Completely Offline, no connection needed
~Book history
~Bilingual bible lookup
~Bilingual hymn lookup
~Note taking
~(New) Go to verse by keyboard only, start with \
~(New) Copy verse by double click, great for note taking w/ google doc
~(Update) Trim off white area in hymn images.
~(New) Added feature to read chapter (look under cog)
~(New) Added bible/note reading (text-to-speech) for both languages

Update: press-hold verse to add to note, to prevent unwanted page change. Added bible TTS in English and Chinese. Minor interface chage.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ca.mrchen.bible2&hl=en
